message.content:
1. Recent studies have been conducted on electrical muscle stimulation (EMS).
2. These studies suggest that EMS may be an alternative to active exercise.
3. The studies focus on patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
4. The studies also focus on patients with chronic heart failure (CHF).
5. The patients in the studies have myopathy.

messages.content:
Statement: Recent studies have shown that electrical muscle stimulation (EMS) may be an alternative to active exercise in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) and chronic heart failure (CHF) patients with myopathy.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
